vclaim: U.S. President Joe Biden and first lady Jill Biden were booed during their pre-recorded statement that aired just before the Super Bowl game on Feb. 7, 2021.
title: Were the Bidens Booed During Their Speech at the Super Bowl?
subtitle: In a pre-recorded video televised before the game, U.S. President Joe Biden and first lady Jill Biden thanked frontline healthcare workers.
author: Nur Ibrahim
